short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Classic Backgammon: Ancient board game with dice for two players.
short.ru: Классические нарды: старинная настольная игра с кубиками для двух игроков.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Experience the timeless game of backgammon with our Classic Backgammon Chrome extension. Play against friends or challenging AI opponents. Enjoy a sleek interface, customizable boards, and intuitive controls. Immerse yourself in this strategic board game wherever you browse. Enhance your gaming moments with Classic Backgammon.

Key Features:

 - Play against friends or AI.
 - Customizable boards and pieces.
 - Sleek and user-friendly interface.
 - Seamless integration with Chrome for convenient access.
 - Engaging gameplay with strategic depth.
